name: Break The Rule
description:
Break the Rule

It's simple local multiplayer game. The goal is to be the first one who breaks the rule given in a level. 

But beware! 

Your opponent has the same intention and will do everything to stop you. 

Both of you will have tools to make it harder for one another. 

Spears, boxes, furniture... even vacuum cleaner or pineapple. Everything can be used as a weapon here. Note: It's raw, post-gamejam version so it has only one level for now and some unrepaired bugs (careful using blower).
